content:
# Point of Contact

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/images/ef8d32b8d6e4df3d949fa7a36e7effea3e3d61164073154d601d567ded0a27c7.jpg)

I certify that all information I have provided in this form is true and correct. I hereby authorize GXI to verify all information provided herein. I agree to promptly notify GXI of any change in the information which I have provided after the date of this declaration. I fully understand that any misinterpretation of failure to disclose information on my part as required herein, may result in the disapproval of my application for GXI products and services, and that GXI is not under any obligation to share with me the reason/s or rationale for such disapproval.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/images/548afa91d1bb95a2aec034d6e075bfd2dc6ab0946887c9a9394cd58a2889a5dd.jpg)
